reviewText: A must have! Very eye opening!
Stuff your veterinarian will not tell you, if you care about your dog/cat you should read this.

This is a compilation of several video interviews done in connection with the book, Dead Pets Don't Lie. It provides insights as to how the research behind the book was done; it's an excellent behind-the-scenes look at the pet food industry. I was personally involved in some of these tapings, which were very professionally done. The Gilberts did an excellent job and asked the right questions (without any discussion beforehand about them). I feel that these interviews add a depth to the book that really can't be conveyed just in print.

Wow! Just wow! As a pet owner and consumer we are lead to believe that the pet food we buy is "healthy" "good for your pet" "nutritious". With the help of this video I have completely changed the food I feed my precious friends.  Very informative and potentially life saving for your animals. What we don't know can hurt us.
Completely blown away by what I didn't know! I will spread the word to my fur baby owners about this. It's a must have!! Definitely worth it!
Awesome dvd!! I tell all my pet lover friends about this!!
This DVD will blow your mind! If you care about your pet, you need to watch this DVD!
